snippet: “A (micro) history of world economics, danced” incorporates members of each community it is performed in into an examination of our collective economic experience.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews national premiere of dance piece A (micro) history of world economics, danced, choreographed by Pascal Rambert, at La MaMa as part of the Crossing the Line festival.
lead_paragraph: “A (micro) history of world economics, danced” incorporates members of each community it is performed in into an examination of our collective economic experience.

headline.seo: ‘A (micro) history’ Is About Our Shared Economic Experience
headline.main: Belongings That Remain After You Go
headline.print_headline: Belongings That Remain After You Go
